item.title: 如何读一篇科学论文
item.description: Starting note: Perhaps the primary difference between reading the scientific literature and reading other kinds of documents is that linear reading is not rewarded. Reading from start to finish is not useful if you don’t extract the information that you need; likewise, you will see people who don’t read start to finish but extract all of the useful information much more quickly. item.title: 社会性类别认知的起源

item.title: 关于风险态度的测量
item.description: Risk attitude is formally modeled as the shape of a decision maker’s utility profile (see Weber, Blais, & Betz (2002) for an overview of different risk frameworks). Measures of risk attitude assess decision makers’ perceptions of risk and/or their preferred levels of risk. We distinguish between three separate approaches to measurement of risk attitude: Behavioral measures of risk:

item.title: 恋爱中的幸福时刻
item.description: 今天陪她去八楼，碰到一位几年不见的故人。回去的路上很多我们之间的往事闪现在脑海中，突然意识到我们已经在一起四年多了，感叹四年原来过得那么快。
